title: Enchanting Emerald Chandbali Jhumkas - Ear01394
features: Intricately crafted Chandbali design featuring a central Emerald gemstone. Delicately cascading pearl drops add a touch of traditional elegance. The entire piece is adorned with sparkling AD stones arranged in a floral motif. Perfect for adding a touch of Telugu splendor to your look.
occasions: and festive occasions. A statement piece for special events where you want to showcase South Indian heritage.
description: These Chandbali Jhumkas offer a timeless blend of tradition and modern elegance. The lustrous gold plating complements the vibrant Emerald, making them a versatile addition to any jewelry collection. The classic design and durable construction ensure they can be cherished for years to come. The design provides an authentic Andhra look.
